events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund for it. The product delivered is not what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request mentioning refund and wrong item received.
An agent from the billing and refunds team has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
I have attached the order number #123456 and a clear photo showing the wrong product delivered. Please let me know if you need anything else.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days and send you a prepaid label to return the wrong item.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to the refund.
The refund process has been completed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if anything else is needed.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that the issue is fully resolved on your end.
Since we have not heard back and the refund was confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about the support experience for this refund case.
